resources.string: Live FM Broadcast from Kolkata, Delhi, Mumbai, bengaluru, Hyderabad, Pune and Chennai in 10+ Indian Languages
Non-stop Add-Free music makes your day.
This app is completely ad-free and never breaks you in the music. Have a greatest test of Indian Music all the time.
Search and save your favorite in a tap. Play music while background and quick play/pause/stop from notification
